params.summary: Base functionality that applies to entire BBCRM and BBIS products for automation.
params.lower_syntax_text: The BaseComponent type exposes the following members.

BaseComponent.description: Initializes a new instance of the BaseComponent class

ClickButton.description: Clicks a basic button.             Uniqueness is dependent purely on the caption!

ConvertToBool.description: Convert the string to a bool value.

CopyToClipBoard.description: Start a new thread that copies a value to the System's Clipboard and waits for that             thread to return.

ElementValueIsNotNullOrEmpty.description: Wait until a displayed element found with the provided xPath does not have a null or empty value             If no matching element is found, a WebDriverTimeoutException is thrown.

ElementValueIsSet.description: Wait until a displayed element found with the provided xPath has the expected value as its text.             If no matching element is found with the expected value, a WebDriverTimeoutException is thrown.

EqualsObjectObjectObject.description: Determines whether the specified Object is equal to the current Object.

Exists.description: Checks if a displayed element exists using the provided xPath selector.

ExistsNow.description: Check if a displayed element exists immediately using the provided xPath selector.

FinalizeObject.description: Allows an object to try to free resources and perform other cleanup operations before it is reclaimed by garbage collection.

GetDatalistColumnIndex.description: Given the xPath for a datalist/grid's headers and the caption of a datalist column, find the index of the column             as it relates to the DOM.

GetDisplayedElement.description: Get the displayed IWebElement using the provided xPath.

GetEnabledElement.description: Get the first found IWebElement based on an xPath that is Displayed AND Enabled.             If no element is found, a WebDriverTimeoutException is thrown.

GetHashCodeObject.description: Serves as a hash function for a particular type.

GetTypeTypeObject.description: Gets the Type of the current instance.

getXButton.description: Format an XPath to find a button.  Adds no additional constraints other than             the caption of the button equalling the provided value.

getXMenuItem.description: Given the caption name of a menu item, return a unique identifier xPath             to find a menu item.

MapColumnCaptionsToIndex.description: Create a mapping of the column captions as keys to their DOM index values.

MemberwiseCloneObjectObject.description: Creates a shallow copy of the current Object.

SetCheckbox(String, Boolean).description: Click a checkbox if it is not the desired value.

SetCheckbox(String, String).description: Click a checkbox if it is not the desired value.

SetTextField.description: Set the value of a field by copy pasting the value into the field and sending a Tab keystroke.

ToStringObject.description: Returns a string that represents the current object.

WaitClick(String).description: Find an element using a provided xPath and click it once it is displayed and enabled.

WaitClick(String, Double).description: Find an element using a provided xPath and click it once it is displayed and enabled.

Driver.description: Selenium WebDriver used to interact with the web browser.

TimeoutSecs.description: The default WebDriver timeout value represented in seconds.
